评论详情: This is for the elastic band money “clip”, not the metal clip version. Great, slim wallet for those who don’t carry much cash. Paired with an Apple- compatible FindMy credit card-looking tracker it’s nearly perfect.  Pros: - holds a fair amount of cards - carbon fiber design is very nice looking - well constructed - push-button pop-up works well to access cards - pockets for outer cards makes your most used cards easily accessible - elastic band is slimmer than the metal clip version  Cons: - no bill fold; must use the elastic band to hold minimal amount of cash - magnet holding the flap down could be a bit stronger; it’s just ok  Bottom line: get it!

Your cards can be protected by the case (I'm guessing the RFID). In my opinion, it does everything I want it to for $39. It looks good with the carbon fiber fabric, it's made well with what seems to be good quality. I like the plastic money clip, but I thought I was getting the small pocket for cash. I don't like the idea of having my cash "secured" by a plastic piece. That's just me.

评论详情: Inexpensive alternative to some of the top brands. Half the price. Fits well in my front pocket. I assume that the ID pocket will get easier to use as it breaks in. I’ve been using it for a couple of weeks now, and LOVE not sitting on my wallet. Couple of things to mention - The description alternates between talking about a money clip or an elastic strap to hold cash and receipts. I was hoping it would be a money clip, but I got the band. After using it, I think that the money clip would have been kind of a pain getting in and out of my pocket, so glad it worked out, BUT, if you really want the clip, you may want to look for something that’s a bit more specific. The other thing is that I ordered black, but I got brown. Didn’t really care enough to exchange it, but again, just be aware.

I looked trying to find where to verify that I would get a money clip. No where did I have a choice. I'm not taking chance on the other color they had. So as much as I like it. The lack of money clip kills the deal for me. Other than that it's perfect. Depends on what you want.
